channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- ThinManager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- ThinManager

item.title: CVE-2024-45826|2024-09-12T14:58:34.096Z -- rockwell%20automation -- thinmanager
item.description: CVE-2024-45826 IMPACT Due to improper input validation, a path traversal and remote code execution vulnerability exists when the ThinManager® processes a crafted POST request. If exploited, a user can install an executable file.

item.description: CVE-2024-45826 IMPACT Due to improper input validation, a path traversal and remote code execution vulnerability exists when the ThinManager® processes a crafted POST request. If exploited, a user can install an executable file.
